meanings: the liberalization of the dress code

vlive.korean: 교복을 사야 되면 당연히 엘리트죠! If I need to buy uniforms, of course I would buy Elite! 듣기 View video AB6IX : 영민이의 '몰래라이브 #1'

vlive.korean: 교복 입어? 귀여운데? 다 같이? - 다 같이 이렇게 하면서 끝내볼까요? School uniform? Cute. Together? - Shall we do this together and say goodbye? 듣기 View video BTS : [Full] BTS Comeback Special: '보'이는 '라'이브 '해'요
vlive.english: School uniform? Cute. Together? - Shall we do this together and say goodbye?

vlive.korean: 여러분 교복이... Everyone, uniform is... 듣기 View video Stray Kids : 막내의 사생활 23 (생일 기념❤)🦊

vlive.korean: 지금은 막 교복 의상으로 입으면 너무 좋지 않냐? Don't you love wearing uniform on stage? 듣기 View video Stray Kids : 막내의 사생활 23 (생일 기념❤)🦊
vlive.english: Don't you love wearing uniform on stage?
